title: SARA INSTITUTE OF DATA SCIENCE
text:
SARA INSTITUTE OF DATA SCIENCE

Apply now






An Ambedkarite Mission
Empowering underrepresented communities through purposeful education and research.
At SARA, our mission is to empower and enrich our community through education, innovation, and collaboration. We are dedicated to fostering a dynamic learning environment that nurtures creativity, critical thinking, and personal growth.
We aim to cultivate a vibrant community where individuals of all backgrounds can thrive, learn, and contribute positively to society.

Learn more







We Teach Free

All our Courses are Offered Free of Charge, Ensuring Accessibility for Everyone.


Â Data ScienceVisualizationWranglingStatisticsGitHubQuartoHTML SlidesWebsite
Â Computer SkillsWord ProcessingSpreadsheetPresentationEmail EtiquetteDigital CalendersSocial MediaGoogle Drive
Â English LanguageWriting SkillsSpeaking SkillsListening SkillsGroup DiscussionCommunicationIELTSTOEFL
Â Research MethodsProposal MakingProblem StatementResearch DesignLiterature ReviewArticle PublicationReference ManagementThesis Writing


Know more





Paying Back to the Community
At SARA, we believe in the power of giving back and creating a positive impact beyond our immediate community.
Our commitment goes beyond education and extends to actively contributing to the betterment of society.
Through various initiatives and programs, we aim to pay it forward and make a meaningful difference.

Become a SARA Supporter







Thanks
A Good Organization is Built by Happy, Well-supported People.Thank you for being a part of the SARA!



Dr.Â Ajay Koli, PhDFounder & Executive Director, SARA.

title: Contact Us
text:
Contact Us
Inquires: sara.institute.info@gmail.com
Mailing address: Ajay Koli, Dr.Â Ambedkar Bhavan, Kakroi Road, Sonipat, Haryana - 131001.
Social media: Twitter

title: About us
text:
About us
We are a non-governmental charitable education and research institute founded in April 2023 by Dr.Â Ajay Koli and Dr.Â Kiran Koli. Our aim is to take data science education to underrepresented students in India. We offer free of cost data science, computer skills, research and English language courses. Our courses help students to:

land a job in the field of data science, and
get a fellowship for higher education.

title: How are we supported
text:
How are we supported
SARA is funded with the support of donations from the community members.
If you are interested in supporting SARA, consider donating here. To inquire about larger donations or opportunities to support SARA, please reach us at sara.institute.info@gmail.com
